title: 待FC：美军在青岛附近海域行动，扣押驶往伊朗的船
contents:
2020年 8月6日，地缘政治报道： 美国海军扣押从中国驶向伊朗的货运船
US Navy seizes ship carrying supplies from China to Iran

在青岛附近美国战舰已经扣押了一条船，这条船装运沸石用于制造新冠病人用的氧气机。
The US warships near the Chinese port of Qingdao have seized a ship which carried zeolite needed for manufacturing oxygen concentrators for coronavirus patients.

几天前， 我收到一份信说我们的船被美国军舰扣押了， 货物能不能交付成为问号， 我们感觉大坏。 -- 伊朗的货主公司 CEO 说。
“Few days ago, we received a letter saying that our ship has been seized by a US warship at the port of Qingdao, making delivery of the cargo to us under a question mark, which gave us a bad shock,” Peyman Bakhshandeh-Nejad, the CEO of Zist Tajhiz Danesh Pouya company in Iran, told FNA on Wednesday.
